title: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
description: Bug 3622: New Package Wizard has confusing message (1GD0L9O)
OB: When creating a new package using the New Package Wizard, the message displayed is confusing.
EB: The message displayed in the New Package Wizard should be clear and easy to understand.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new Java project. 
2. Select the project. 
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
